patterns: When does the office opens?
What is the opening time of the office?
When can I go to the office?
responses: The office is open from 8AM until 5PM
You can go to the office which is open from 8AM until 5PM

patterns: I am facing problems, how can I report to the office?
I want to report about something to the office
I want to do some reporting
responses: Sure, please contact the dormitory administrative number: 0198675436
Reporting can be done by going to this website: www.reportdorm.com

patterns: I am facing problems, who can I contact?
Is there any number that I can contact?
Can you give me an emergency number?
responses: Dormitory emergency: 0119998876
Please contact this number immediately: 0119998876

patterns: How much is the dormitory fees?
I want to know my dormitory fees
How much do I need to pay for dormitory fees?
responses: The dormitory fees for 1 semester is RM600, payment can be made through www.fpxums.com
Dormitory fees is RM600 per semester

patterns: Who is the student representation for my dormitory?
How can I contact the students representation?
responses: The student representation can be contacted through 0187845432
You can contact 0187845432, he is the dormitory student representation

patterns: Where is the cafe?
When does the cafe open?
Where can I eat?
responses: The cafe is located near the dormitory office, it is open from 7AM until 10PM
Right beside the office, please go before 10 PM

patterns: What are the dormitories activities for this week?
Is there any activities this week?
Where can I check dormitories activity?
responses: The activities can be checked on this website: www.dormactivity.com
Please go to www.dormactivity,com to check dormitories activity

patterns: How can I access the dormitories announcment?
Is there any announcement made by the dormitory?
Did the dormitory announced anything?
responses: For announcement, it can be checked in www.dorm.com
Please go to www.dorm.com

patterns: My room has some minor damages, how can I report them?
I want to report about demages in my dorm
responses: Please go to www.reportdorm.com to report dormitory damage
Damages can be reported through www.reportdorm.com

patterns: I want to make a refund on my dormitory fees
I do not live in dormitory anymore, how can I get a refund
I want a refund
responses: Sure, you can go to the dormitory office to request a refund
To request for refund, the process can be made in the dormitory office

patterns: Is there any security in this dormitory?
How can I contact the security?
responses: Yes, the chief security is Encik Hilmi, you can contact him through this number: 0176574325
Please contact this number: 018758532 (encik Hisyam)

patterns: Where can i park my car?
Is there any parking in this dormitory?
Where is the parking?
responses: The parking is located near the cafe
You can park your car near the cafe which is a designated parking area for students

patterns: what is the postal address?
What address can I use to post my things?
responses: the postal address is Dormitory Excellent, 89000 Sabah

patterns: Is there any clubs I can join?
I want to join a club
responses: You can contact the student represenation
Please contact the student representation for further details

patterns: Who is the advisor for dormitory?
Who can I contact if i want to talk to the advisor?
responses: Please contact encik Andy (0187965426)

patterns: how can i check my merit?
I want to check my merit?
responses: You can do so by going to the office
Please go to the office to check merit
